Master index Index for misc/dist 

Index for misc/dist

M-files files in this directory:

 stk_distSTK_DIST computes a matrix of (Euclidean) distances
 stk_filldistSTK_FILLDIST computes the fill distance of a set of points.
 stk_filldist_discretizedSTK_FILLDIST_DISCRETIZED computes the (discrete) fill distance of a set of points.
 stk_filldist_exactSTK_FILLDIST_EXACT computes the (exact) fill distance of a set of points.
 stk_gpquadformSTK_GPQUADFORM computes a Gibbs-Paciorek quadratic form.
 stk_mindistSTK_MINDIST computes the separation distance of a set of points
